text: Soni (kumbuchilani) katema kajwasunjisye ngani Ntume ﷺ kwa wamo mwa achiwammakwakwe (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم), basi ndema ja waajijuwile (asilijo kwa Aisha رضي الله عنهم), Allah ni kummanyisya (Ntume ﷺ) yalakweyo, (Ntume ﷺ) jwatagulile (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم) upande wine wanganijo nambo upande wine jwaulesile, basi ndema jajwatagulile yalakweyo (Hafswa رضي الله عنهم) watite: “Wani wantagulile yele?” (Ntume ﷺ) jwatite: “Andagulile (Allah) Jwakumanyilila nnope, Jwaasimanya abali syosope.”
